value.name: Wedding ring thief Steven Kerr has his sentence cut
value.description: A DRUG user who stole the wedding ring from the finger of a terminally ill 87-year-old woman has had his jail term cut on appeal. Steven George Kerr, 36, broke into his neighbour Nellie Holliday ...

value.name: Is Your Alternative Dispute Resolution Program a Flea-Dip?
value.description: In his ingenious article, "The Folly of Rewarding for A While Hoping for B," Steven Kerr points out that employers often not only fail to reward for desirable behaviors, but inadvertently reward undesirable behaviors as well. If you want supervisors to ...
